# University of Wisconsin - System Custom JavaScript Modifications

University of Wisconsin â€“ System has implemented custom JavaScript to ensure consistent user experience.

## Course Navigation.

The first time a course is accessed by a teacher or higher the navigation reset to fix template.  Users may notice that the navigation has been changed.  Several page refreshes may be required, before the user sees the finalized menu as show in Figure 1.

 ![width=75](data:image/*;base64,)

Figure 1: Standard Course Navigation

The following items are disabled; discussions, people, pages, files, modules, outcomes, conferences.  If users enable them, they will be turned back off, within a few page refreshes.

## Course Home Page

- Scripts will set modules to the home page and enable course announcements with a limit of 3

## Course Settings Page

- Scripts will hide course home page announcement settings.
- Conclude and Delete buttons will only be displayed for admins.

## Pages

- The use as front page menu has been hidden.
